Chapter 16: Distinguishing Accomplishments
I will now explain the accomplishments of the three divisions.
Traveling through the air with mastery is the highest;
Concealing one's form and tracks is the middling accomplishment;
Worldly affairs.
The three kinds of accomplishments are distinguished according to the superior, middling, and inferior.

The highest accomplishment method of the three divisions is to attain the immortal state of vidyadhara, travel through the air, accomplish the five supernatural powers, and also accomplish many kinds, either attaining the complete cessation of defilements;

Or realizing the stage of bodhisattva;

Possessing the above matters is called the supreme among the supreme methods of accomplishment.
The methods of accomplishment in the three divisions leave traces on the body, bestowing great power;

The lower methods of accomplishment in the three divisions:
